title: #131 - Virtue Epistemology
description: In the unofficial part three of their discussion on knowledge and epistemology, Connor and Dan explore the other side of the coin, specifically the virtuous side. Sometimes it's better to become a person who can know things rather than understand what things you should know. You know? If not, just listen to the podcast. Also, hear Dan fretting about the debate and Connor talk about Ancient Aliens.
